product_name: Columbia Explorer's Delight Printed Fleece Jacket - Girls'
long_description: The Columbia Explorer's Delight(TM) Printed Fleece jacket keeps her cozy while fun colors and patterns brighten any wardrobe. Omni-Wick(TM) technology keeps her dry even under multiple layers. Omni-Wick(TM) fabric wicks moisture away from the skin to keep her dry and comfortable. Extended collar provides added warmth while a full-length zipper allows for ventilation. 19 in. back length.
short_description: The Columbia Explorer's Delight(TM) Printed Fleece jacket keeps her cozy while fun colors and patterns brighten any wardrobe. Omni-Wick(TM) technology keeps her dry even under multiple layers.
